Austin Public Health has provided 18,427 vaccines to the Austin and Travis County community as of Thursday, according to APH Director Stephanie Hayden-Howard.
But one thing is certain, she said duri… [+4850 chars]

articles.title: Full-dose blood thinners decreased need for life support and improved outcome in hospitalized COVID-19 patients - National Institutes of Health
articles.description: Full doses of blood thinners, in addition to being safe, were superior to the doses normally given to prevent blood clots in hospitalized patients.

articles.author: John Quinn
articles.title: You're More Likely to Get COVID From This Than Coughing, Study Says - Best Life
articles.description: Experts are warning that talking poses as much risk of spreading COVID as coughing, if not more, following new research on aerosol transmission.
articles.content: While our understanding of COVID and how it's transmitted has evolved over the last year, a solid consensus emerged early that aerosols, meaning contaminated droplets, are the most common way the vir… [+4089 chars]

articles.author: Caitlin Owens
articles.title: The most vulnerable Americans aren't getting enough vaccine information - Axios
articles.description: Hispanic, Black and lower-income Americans are more likely to say they don't have enough information.
articles.content: Hispanic, Black and lower-income Americans are more likely than white and higher-income Americans to say they don't have enough information about when or where they'll be able to get a coronavirus va… [+525 chars]
